The plane is an Airbus A380, a double-deck, wide-body, four-engine jet airliner manufactured by Airbus. It is the world's largest passenger airliner, and the airports at which it operates have upgraded facilities to accommodate it.
The plane is an Emirates jetliner. It is a large commercial airliner, typically used for long-haul flights. It is painted with patriotic colors and is sitting on the tarmac at an airport.
